      • setImagesOnClick

        private void setImagesOnClick(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane,
                              javafx.scene.image.ImageView img,
                              int index)
        Custom onClick handler for card image containers. Handles events where card is clicked, places lock image to container when clicked first time and removes it if repeated.
        Parameters:
        img - ImageView image of the card
        index - int card index, helps to determine which card is clicked.
        pane - StackPane card image container.
